message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your offer, but unfortunately, $8000 is below my minimum price. I'm willing to come down to $9500.  This still allows me some profit and demonstrates my willingness to work with you. Let me know if you're interested in this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $9500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9000. Would you be open to discussing this price?
